website_summaries.verdict: A premium hermit crab food that brings plenty of health benefits to the table, including a focus on nutritious ingredients, exoskeleton color enhancement, and less waste.
pros: Alfalfa meal, squid meal, fish meal, wheat, fish oil, and red pepper powder are the first 6 ingredients
Made without fillers like corn or soy
Encourages growth, energy, and bolder coloration
cons: This hermit crab food is relatively pricey, even for a high-end food

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE. TOXIC TO HERMIT CRABS
customer_reviews.text: All prepared commercial food targeted to hermit crabs can be toxic. Mine thankfully did not like this before I found that out. If you must purchase food, use freeze dried shrimp, meal worms, crickets and fruit or better yet fresh. Check out Hermit Crab Owners on Facebook
customer_reviews.author: CELLA PRIME

customer_reviews.title: Crabs devour this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. My three hermits crabs love it and will often emerge from their slumber just from the scent of it. I mix it with dried veggies and fruit. This is the only stuff that disappears immediately. Supposedly it’s soy free which is good for the crabs. My crabs have survived for over three years with this as their primary diet. Highly recommend for a healthy crabitat. Make sure to have proper humidity and heat along with four inches of sand substrate or the food won’t matter because you’ll be feeding skeletons. Don’t forget the salt water soaking dish and of course fresh water!
customer_reviews.author: Molz

customer_reviews.title: First food they "run" over to eat!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about 4 different foods for our 3 crabs... Invariably it molds before they touch it really... And they all hibernated for a few months it seems.... I got this food and suddenly all 3 are active and literally run over to get the food when I put it out! Never any left to mold!
customer_reviews.author: Canuck72

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crabs need a lot of care and feeding.
customer_reviews.text: My crabs aren’t big eaters, but this does disappear over the course of a few days. A lot of crab owners don’t know the animals need 80 degrees, HIGH humidity, lots of different shells, fruits, a fresh and a salt water “pond”, a cover, and 6 inches of coconut bedding to burrow through!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Crabs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Like any crab owner, we give our hermies a lot of treats. That said, they still like to eat this food. We don’t use it as the prime staple of their diet but we always have it in the bowl and they seem to enjoy it as it’s always gone.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is what I’ve always fed my crab and he is over 5 years old. In addition to this I give him blueberries, strawberries, almonds and all manner of fresh fruit and veggies. I did give it 2 stars on the smell because it really does stink but I don’t care about that. The crabs are obviously getting what they need.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good value good size for crab mouth
customer_reviews.text: I camnot tell if the crab really eats it. I give him cut grapes and grass and small pieces of bread sometimes too for variety. I do like that it is a very small size poppyseed looking food. The other stuff i use is bigger pieces that i cant tell if the crab can even chow it down. Has no weird smell. Cheaper than the stuff at the pet store and a bigger container to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs love it. I use this along with fresh fruits and veggies, hard boiled eggs, nuts, popcorn. Basically, Jurassic food is the constant component of their diet and add other things to their dish to give them some variety. They always eat the Jurrasic food. I have had 6 hermit crabs for 19 months now. They molt beautifully and don't try to eat eachother. I believe Jurassic is the reason why. .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G.

customer_reviews.title: This food was tried and returned already!
customer_reviews.text: The seal has been ripped and pulled back, and the inner lid and food are damp from whoever stuck their fingers in here. This is one of the most highly recommended foods I could find, but AMAZON is really just tossing this crap in a bin and sending it back out again. As a person who ends up returning a lot of stuff, I guess this is karma? Don't take it out on the crab.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin P. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Not good for crabs health
customer_reviews.text: Not healthy for hermit crabs. They need fresh fruits, meats, they are scavengers pretty much anything we eat the crabs can eat as long as they’re not seasoned. But this pellet stuff will not help their color or help them molt.
customer_reviews.author: Jortney

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs love these new pellets. I pair it with freeze dried tiny shrimp and they seem to enjoy it a lot. A little goes a long way and I think I’m going to have the container for a long time, so value for price is great. I would definitely get this if you have hermies.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Coombs

customer_reviews.title: My crabbies don't eat this as well as the kind ...
customer_reviews.text: My crabbies don't eat this as well as the kind I usually buy but I only got this because I was trying to switch up what I was feeding them. I didn't scoop all of it out of substrate (I guess I missed some) and it molded over. I didn't realize that pellet stuff could do that although had I known this was a pellet type food I wouldn't have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: sunnypreposition

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs wouldn’t eat it. But I’ve heard lots of good things about the product and there wasn’t nothing wrong with it. It just didn’t appeal to my hermmies.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: A great product, but my crabs feel otherwise🙄
customer_reviews.text: This was used as food for my hermies. I have a tank of small ones and a tank of larger ones. I normally see my crabs a lot unless they’re molting. Well they went to the food and did not like it. I tried it alone with no other bugs or fruits. Still nothing. I wasted money🤦🏽‍♀️ But it’s cool, it didn’t kill them, it didn’t stink or anything. My crabbies just didn’t care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Decent food option - good price
customer_reviews.text: This is nice as a replacement meal for hermit crabs and when you are on vacation. I still use natural food for them when I am around.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crabs like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little jar. Pellets are smaller than other brands I have purchased, which I like for my hermit crabs. It doesn’t smell bad and is the best price I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: Jon & Christa

customer_reviews.title: My crabbies like it
customer_reviews.text: One of the better crab foods on the market if you are feeding processed foods at all. Mine get a little of it here and there and they love it. I would also use this if I am going to be gone a few days and can't use fresh foods. As someone else stated, mine came in a regular container with a screw top lid as opposed to the container shown which was an added bonus. I saved my old jar to dump this in when I opened it and then found out that was unnecessary when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa A

customer_reviews.title: The Crabs Ate It
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a hermit crab expert. My daughter's crabs did eat this food and they didn't eat the food we bought in Florida, so I guess it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The hermits love it .the box it arrived in however was smashed half opened .the food was still sealed and useable
customer_reviews.author: sherry hovatter

customer_reviews.title: Last awhile in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: No clue on crabs but if yo are a mom n your kid has one this will last awhile. Nice. It’s crumbles. Like little dots.
customer_reviews.author: Reva brown

customer_reviews.title: My hermit crabs love it
customer_reviews.text: My crabs weren't eating much before I bought this, but I'm not worried anymore. They seem to love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Rocks
customer_reviews.text: They are man made rocks. My only issue is they have so many hole made into them they are had to clean at times
customer_reviews.author: David Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Happy crabs
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this brand and I'm glad I did! My crabs actually eat it and they seem more active. It's about the same price as what I was using too.
customer_reviews.author: Neil-io

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crabs will love it
customer_reviews.text: Crabs seem to like it, and apparently cats too 🤦‍♀️ because they stole it and ate it....
customer_reviews.author: cristen austin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I ordered this for my hermit crabs. They really loved this food. I would recommend it to all. Much better than what I was giving them. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good mix to a verity of foods
customer_reviews.text: We use this along with 3 other foods. We have had crabs for 2 years and I feel it is important to vary there food.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Popular food
customer_reviews.text: I feed my Hermit crabs a variety of food, but when I put this stuff in, they go right for it. I definitely recommend you pick some up.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Great hermie food !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality hermit crab food. Our hermies are more than 5 years old now and have grown out of their shells many times. This food is their staple diet along with fresh water and sea salted water. We feed Jurassi Diet in a small feed shell and it stays put and nice and clean while they crawl in and out to dine. I was happy to find it on Amazon because it's not readily available in our local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Maxie

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crabs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have any problem with it, my hermit crabs seem to love it!
customer_reviews.author: trishthedish

customer_reviews.title: I like this for my crab!
customer_reviews.text: My crab has become extremely active and friendly after eating this.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rae Husbands

customer_reviews.title: Mine dont like it
customer_reviews.text: Mine dont like it. Very small granules not great feeding instructions
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: They dont like
customer_reviews.text: My crabs won’t touch it. Other than that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: EmmyV

customer_reviews.title: Small jar but lots of food
customer_reviews.text: Small jar but lots of food pellets inside. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kflew

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Hermit crab loved this food! Very affordable..easy for my 10 year old soon to feed his crab
customer_reviews.author: Lace  Collins

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My crabbies have eaten this, for years, along with different treats.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Crabs delight!
customer_reviews.text: Our hermit crabs love this food! The stuff we got when we bought the crab molds so quickly and they never want to eat. This must smell yummy to them bc they come running for it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Sabolevski

customer_reviews.title: My hermit crabs seem healthy eating this.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this 4 months with hermit crabs in my marine aquarium. They remain healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Ross, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: My crabs don’t eat it at all. Eat some other food I can’t find and this just sits in the bowl
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Crustacean food
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my cherry shrimp and they seem to like it
customer_reviews.author: Surreptrixus

customer_reviews.title: Crabs don't love it
customer_reviews.text: Crabs don't seem to like it as much as fish flakes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Healthy hermit crabs
customer_reviews.text: Well the crabs are still alive so I take that as a good sign!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good sized container. Looks and smells like fish food. My hermies seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I never know about products like this, but my hermit crabs love it
customer_reviews.text: I never know about products like this, but my hermit crabs love it. It's a very pleasant change from the other stuff I tried to feed them. They wouldn't touch it. This JurassiDiet they run to.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: If you're only going to feed your hermit crab one ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're only going to feed your hermit crab one food, this is it. Hermit crabs only usually molt once a year and while mine have been eating this, along with other tasty treats, they molt every couple of months. Growing boys!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Jurassic Diet Hermit Crab Food
customer_reviews.text: My babies eat it wet when there is no fresh fruit. It smells like fish so it needs to be changed frequently. I have noticed their colors are a bit brighter, but I'm not sure if it's the food or other things. A bit pricy but I'll buy it again when I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This did not get delivered it was not in my box
customer_reviews.text: I need this food delivered right away I got all my other orders but this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morin

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and happy
customer_reviews.text: Dexter our hermit crab ate it so I'm sure he liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Hermit crabs seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: The pellets are very small but there’s a lot of food there
customer_reviews.author: Sally Blow

customer_reviews.title: Crabs enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Fishy smelling but my crabs like it. It has a bunch of vitamins and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jbeth

customer_reviews.title: My hermit crab loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff to feed a hermit crab. My hermit crab loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Buccilla

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a good product
customer_reviews.text: Food has been very enjoyed by our almost one year old hermit!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brown

customer_reviews.title: The food is great. My 13 year old hermit crab loves it
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the first bottle. They have changed the packaging and it pours out way to fast. The food is great. My 13 year old hermit crab loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Quality food.
customer_reviews.text: My hermies love this food- it smells fresher (fishy odor) than the pet store brand I used to get. Their color has changed from a dull gray to their normal shiny red/purple and their activity level has increased. A little goes a long way so one canister should last for a while, making the higher price worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When you can't find it at your pet store...
customer_reviews.text: You know what? I cannot find hermit crab food at our pet store where we BOUGHT our hermit crabs! I'm so grateful for Amazon! Our hermit crabs love this stuff! We have 5 crabs and this container lasts a good few months.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Hermit Crab loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our hermit crab absolutely loved the food he loves so much he sleeps in it now he has never done that!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Davis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get.
customer_reviews.text: Our hermit crab didn’t even eat it...in return ended up dying...
customer_reviews.author: Kanandi

customer_reviews.title: my hermit crabs not interested in this food
customer_reviews.text: I tried for 2 weeks feeding this food, but my hermit crab doesn’t eat this at all. :(
customer_reviews.author: Grace & Love

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hermits
customer_reviews.text: My son has two hermit crabs and they have lasted longer than normal with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Walden

customer_reviews.title: My hermit cabs are loving the food!
customer_reviews.text: My hermmies are Darell and Donnie both 2years old, they seem to be loving there new food, which makes me very happy because these boys are my babies!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crabs love this food source. They will sit in their food dish for hours and sometimes they prefer this over fresh fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: mrsperry36

customer_reviews.title: My crabs live it
customer_reviews.text: I have four hermit crabs and they love it... The pellets are small enough for their little mouth.😊
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Our hermit crab LOVES this food. He was barely eating his other kind of food. Now comes out more often for this amazing food. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty for hermit crabs
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with the powder from another canister of food and my crabs love it. It appears to be one of the more healthier foods I've found for them without a lot of fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Hermie Food!
customer_reviews.text: The hermies love this stuff! My biggest guy gets into the dish right away and starts making a mess of it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: The crabs like it
customer_reviews.text: The crabs seem to like this stuff. We replace it every night and wash their bowls so no mold forms.
customer_reviews.author: Eagletree

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My hermit crab didn’t move much before, but after trying this food, he is moving around like crazy. Will definitely keep purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Resoff

customer_reviews.title: Hermie loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Hermie loves it. Will last a long time for sure.
customer_reviews.author: marshmellow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, much better than most brands of Hermit Crab food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for my guys
customer_reviews.text: My hermies personally don't like it and neither do my crickets. It smells like they would like it, but I am just throwing it away every week uneaten.
customer_reviews.author: aja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mixed with the tiniest bit of creamy peanut butter or organic apple sauce and my Crabs can't get enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not their favorite
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say they love it but I'm happy that it doesn't mold as quickly as some others.
customer_reviews.author: jbird

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the price! Arrived quickly and was sealed, very pleased

customer_reviews.title: Seals broken
customer_reviews.text: The foods seal was broken and little bit came out. But other than that it good.

customer_reviews.title: Over all pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bigger that expected over not much to tell great value
customer_reviews.author: candace varner

customer_reviews.title: Caviar of hermit crab foods..
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time which was essential as this is the primary food I feed my hermit crabs, they love the stuff and the local stores didn't have any available...
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hermies are very picky eaters and they LOVE this food. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best buy for my Hermit Crabs. Found it on Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: John Ring

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Crabbie Paddy loves it, too! Will buy again... great service

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my crabs love this stuff, i will buy again and again! highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: S. Lannin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The crabs love it and have gotten their color back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really like it!
customer_reviews.text: This food help the vibrant colors of the crabs shell to develop. They really like it !
customer_reviews.author: Synergi

customer_reviews.title: It's what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 hermit crabs. I used to feed them fresh fruit, but decided to get some crab food since it's much more convenient and rich in nutrients. The food is potent in smell, but seals up in the container no problem. The pellets are really small. I have one crab that seems really happy after switching and one that still remains dosile as ever. I'm surprised how little they eat. I give them about 10 pellets at a time and I replace most of it after about a week. They seem happy and healthy, but I can't say they run to the food like others have implied.
customer_reviews.author: ried

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: average bottle. Full. Goes a long way. Great for the price. Bought 2 bottles a year ago and still have almost 1 and 1/2 left
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey McCoy

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: One of the very few store bought foods I will feed my crabs. They absolutely love this stuff. The packaging has changed from this picture though. I chose to put mine in an old spice bottle so that I could sprinkle it out over fresh carrots, broccoli, apple, mango, or whatever fresh foods I have on hand. (I have 4 crabbie babies, the oldest of which I raised from a tiny to now a 3 year old large crab.)
customer_reviews.author: faithie robertson

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was just as I expected. My hermit crab has been eating the food. It does not have a bad fishy odor as some other hermit crab food does. It is also a good size and will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Sokolovic

customer_reviews.title: Great prepared food for Hermit Crabs
customer_reviews.text: It's the only prepared food my Hermit Crabs love. JurassiDiet, in addition to fresh food, keeps them very HAPPY, active, and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: This product smells terrible!! We have had hermit crabs for about ...
customer_reviews.text: This product smells terrible!! We have had hermit crabs for about 6 months now. The food we have purchased in the past did not have an odor like this. Honestly, it is difficult to be in the room with the crabs because the smell is so bad!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tatton

customer_reviews.title: MY HERMIT CRABS MAY HAVE LIKED IT, BUT I DON'T UNLESS YOU LIKE VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: MY HERMIT CRABS MAY HAVE LIKED IT, BUT I DON'T UNLESS YOU LIKE VERY SMELLY HERMIT CRAB FOOD SITTING IN THEIR FOOD BOWL...
customer_reviews.author: Katie Plezia

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this a couple of days ago and it seems like a nice product. My crabs haven't been eating their other food, so I thought I would try this one out. Unfortunately I haven't seen my crabs eat this food yet, but I did just move them into a new tank, so I assume they are taking some time to adjust to their new surroundings. I will update my review once they have some time to get used to the new tank.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel star

customer_reviews.title: This just keeps them alive.
customer_reviews.text: I used this maybe once and stuck to hermit crab food from MT pet emporium it’s dehydrated food that they go nuts for.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: JurassiDiet Hermit Crab Food
product_meta.description: Size:60g/ 2.1 oz.Jurassidiet is THE premium food for hermit crabs. It contains only the highest quality ingredients without low nutritional value fillers (like corn meal). It contains a broad spectrum of all the important components needed in a Hermit Crab diet: protein, fat, carbohydrates, vitamins and minerals. Jurassidiet is different from other foods on the market because of its nutritional value and palatability. You will see increased growth, appetite, coloration, and vitality in your animal within 1 month of constant usage of JurassiDiet. Guaranteed. Jurassidiet costs more than other Hermit Crab foods because of its superior formulation and quality ingredients. Contains no soy, which can interfere with calcium adsorption. Ingredients: krill meal, fish meal, alfalfa, fish Oil, beta carotene, spirulina, xanthophyll, vitamin a Acetate, D-Activated animal Sterol (D3), Vitamin B12, Riboflavin, Niacin, folic acid, Calcium pantothenate, Pyridoxine hydrochloride, Thiamine, biotin, DL Alphatocopherol (E), L-ascorbyl-2-polyphosphate (C), choline chloride, Cobalt sulfate, copper sulfate, ferrous sulfate, manganese sulfate, ethylenediamine dihydroiodide, mineral water, Guaranteed analysis: Crude protein (min): 35% Vitamin A (Min): 8000 IU/kg (3600 IU/lb), Crude Fat (min): 5% Vitamin D3 (min): 450 IU/kg (205 IU/lb), Crude Fiber (max): 5% Vitamin E (min): 200 IU/kg (90 IU/lb) moisture (max): 10%, ash (max): 9%
feature_bullets: Utilizes a calcium rich, alfalfa base
